Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute near North Ave/I-90
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted Eastbound via North Avenue, Ashland, Cortland, Elston and North Avenue due to street blockage near North Ave/I-90.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Ashland, Cortland, Elston and North Avenue due to street blockage near North Ave/I-90.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: # 63 63rd Temporary Reroute near Hayes Drive
